document.full_text: china executed on wednesday three filipinos convicted of drug trafficking despite a flurry of public appeals for clemency in the philippines, and days after amnesty international slammed beijing's sweeping use of the death penalty.
document.title: china executes 3 filipinos despite manila's pleas
lines_and_colors: china executed on wednesday three filipinos convicted of drug trafficking despite a flurry of public appeals for clemency in the philippines, and days after amnesty international slammed beijing's sweeping use of the death penalty.
